entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.5°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
